Uses of Class
NationMania.core.State

  • Packages that use State 
    Package Description
    NationMania.core
    NationMania.core is incharge of gameplay and back-end of UI.
    NationMania.db
    NationMania.db is incharge of communicating with the DB, connecting and executing queries

    • Uses of State in NationMania.core

      Fields in NationMania.core declared as State 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static State Nations.myLand
      the current played nation
      private static State Game.nextState
      nextState the next state that will be displayed to the player if he hit the "pass" button
      Fields in NationMania.core with type parameters of type State 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.util.ArrayList<State> Nations.allStates
      list of all the states exist in the DB, orderd from the hardest state to the easiest.
      private static java.util.NavigableMap<java.lang.Double,State> Nations.weightsMap
      map of ‹probabilty,state› used to implement fast randomization of a state from the list.
      each state set with the value of the sum of all probabilities of all the states that are before it in the list.
      Methods in NationMania.core that return State 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static State Nations.getMyLand() 
      static State Game.getNextState() 
      private static State Nations.randomizeState()
      Function for randomizing state from the states list.
      The function randomizing a number between 1 to the sum of all state's probabilities, and returns the nation with the closest
      value to the randomized number, from all values that are larger then it.
      The function randomizing states, until it gets a state that was not played in this game already.
      Methods in NationMania.core that return types with arguments of type State 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.ArrayList<State> Nations.getAllStates() 
      Methods in NationMania.core with parameters of type State 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private static void Nations.setMyLand(State randomizedLand)
      Updates the current round nation and logs this nation in the game and player history
      static void Game.setNextState(State nextState)
      Sets the parameter nextState as this game's next state
